Package io.github.fuzzy39.swingRPG

Class Engine

java.lang.Object
io.github.fuzzy39.swingRPG.Engine
public class Engine extends Object
This class is the primary engine class. as for now it has miscellaneous useful things. It's a bit scatter-brained, maybe things will improve in the future?
Author:
Fuzzy39

      public Engine(String windowTitle)
      Create the game engine! You probably only need one of these.

      map - the world map that will be played on.

    • loadTexture

      public static BufferedImage loadTexture(String filename)
      Create an texture from a file name. This method really does pretty much nothing, but it saves you writing a try/catch, I guess.
      Parameters:
      filename -
      Returns:
      the texture in question. If loading failed, returns null.
